Moo Captured! Ranchers Rejoice!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2001 Topics (Year Of The Heart Crystal): Moo Captured! Ranchers Rejoice!
By Lisa Shock on Friday, September 21, 2001 - 01:20 pm:

We have finally confirmed that Moo can be gotten off CD in the US version of the game, and the image.ccd is now posted the Laboratory!

All Hail Darthgali! He found it on a copy of Beck Mellow Gold (and it also makes a Magnet) and submitted it for testing! John Hawley has confirmed that the code is good!

Now, that leaves Gold Suezo to be found....

THEY'RE ONLY FOUND IN THE JAPANESE VERSION OF THE GAME!!! By Lisa Shock on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 12:48 am:

I own 7 pressings (including one from the first week of release), and none work. Lots of people here have owned multiple copies of this disc for years, all in vain. This was't simply a matter of finding the disc, it was a matter of actually confirming that it made the monster. Hundreds of people have been buying every copy they could find in the search for the right pressing.
